div.p: M65/8972, unit 107, VPRS 3991/P inward correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to place at my disposal the following amounts for disbursement during the remainder of the year.

div.p: I further beg to solicit, that from the sum placed under authority for travelling expenses the amount of £20 may be cancelled and along with £15 yet available out of the vote for travelling expenses be placed at my disposal for defraying incidental expenses. The transit expenses during the year have been so heavy as to leave not a sufficient amount to cover outstanding incidental accounts & to provide for the requirements of incidental work during the next three months, especially as an other second hand Garden cart has to be purchased and for that purpose the exhausted store vote is no longer available.
